page.title: 18MY HOBBY
page.content: On Friday I go to Drama Workshop at Totland C.P. School. At Dramaworkshop we try to improve our drama. We do improvisation when some of us get in a group and make up a play. We don't have any lines to say because in improvisation we just make a plot on what we are going to do and whose who and then act it out while the others watch. The hard thing about improvisation is that you have to make up the words and actions whilst you're doing it. We also do two syllable words when some of us get into a group and mime out the first syllable andthen the second syllable and then the whole word and the other have to guess what the word is.
